text.tspan: What does it cover?

text.data-name: Cyber Liability Insurance typically includes coverage for legal costs and damages related to the following coverage areas:
text.tspan: Cyber Liability Insurance typically includes coverage for
legal costs and damages related to the following
coverage areas:

text.data-name: Cybercrime Insurance can be purchased in addition to Cyber Liability Insurance to provide coverage for loss of funds due to cybercrime, including phishing, hacking, or social engineering fraud. This policy includes coverage for notification costs, data res
text.tspan: Cybercrime Insurance can be purchased in addition to
Cyber Liability Insurance to provide coverage for loss of
funds due to cybercrime, including phishing, hacking, or
social engineering fraud. This policy includes coverage for
notification costs, data restoration, and legal expenses.

text.data-name: Incident Response Cost: Coverage for the cost of access to a 24/7 cyber incident response hotline and a dedicated team to assist you in coordinating an incident response following a cybercrime.
text.tspan: Incident Response Cost: Coverage for the cost of
access to a 24/7 cyber incident response hotline
and a dedicated team to assist you in coordinating
an incident response following a cybercrime.

text.data-name: Legal, Forensic, and Breach Management Costs: Coverage for legal advice, notification fees, crisis management services, and credit monitoring.
text.tspan: Legal, Forensic, and Breach Management Costs:
Coverage for legal advice, notification fees, crisis
management services, and credit monitoring.

text.data-name: System Damage and Restoration Costs: Repairs and restoration of the software systems damaged due to the cyber event.
text.tspan: System Damage and Restoration Costs: Repairs and
restoration of the software systems damaged due
to the cyber event.

text.data-name: Social Engineering (optional coverage): Coverage should an employee be tricked into providing access to a system or sending funds to a fraudulent bank account
text.tspan: Social Engineering (optional coverage): Coverage
should an employee be tricked into providing
access to a system or sending funds to a fraudulent
